name: sup3rS3cretMes5age
description: sup3rS3cretMes5age is a self-hosted tool to create secret, expiring links to messages. It encrypts content and only decrypts client-side when the link is opened.

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Creates one-time links to encrypted messages that self-destruct

features.title: Client
features.description: Encrypts messages in browser before sending to server

features.title: One
features.description: Destroys messages after first viewing for security

features.title: Time Expiration
features.description: Sets automatic expiration for messages after specified duration

features.title: Password Protection
features.description: Optionally requires password to decrypt and view messages

features.title: No Registration
features.description: Creates secret messages without accounts or authentication

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Optionally notifies sender when message is read

features.title: Custom Expiration
features.description: Chooses from preset durations or sets custom expiration time
